output: html_notebook

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# load packages
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(magrittr)
library(stringr)

# initial inspection of dataset
crime <- read_csv("crime_2020_to_present.csv")
head(crime)

glimpse(crime)
summary(crime)
colnames(crime)

# standardize values
names(crime) <- make.names(names(crime))

```

```{r}
# check missing values
colSums(is.na(crime))

# check and delete duplicates
sum(duplicated(crime))

crime <- crime %>%
  distinct()
crime
```

```{r}
colnames(crime)
chosen_cols <- crime %>%
  select(
    Vict.Sex, 
    Vict.Age, 
    AREA.NAME
    ) 
head(chosen_cols, 100)

adult_victims <- chosen_cols %>%
  filter(Vict.Age > 17) %>%
  arrange(Vict.Age)
adult_victims

age_count <- adult_victims %>%
  filter(!is.na(Vict.Age)) %>%
  group_by(Vict.Age) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(Vict.Age)
age_count
```
